about_the_game:
A monster fish has appeared in lake Lagoda. To fight it you must gather a group of friends, and embark on an odyssey across the surrounding lands. Are you ready to embrace the adventure?

Explore a wide variety of cities and different landscapes


On your journey, you will explore forests, mountains, caves, dungeons, villages, and cities. You will also set sail and travel over sea, and lakes. Make friends, complete quests, fight enemies, and catch some fish! Experience the rich lore of the land, and develop your character's magical, and technical abilities.

Engage in fast-paced battles


You will meet a great variety of enemies as you travel through the lands. The game uses a fast-paced, turn-based battle system, where the different enemies have different elemental weaknesses.

Try out the demo


The game is scheduled to come out in 2024. But you can already now try out the free demo of the game.

Lagoda Odyssey features:

  • 16-bit graphic style
  • A vast world to explore
  • Every character has his/her own side quest
  • World based on Slavic and Nordic tales
  • Fast, engaging Turn-based battles
  • Optional side quests
  • Lots of wonders, adventure, and exploration

name: Lagoda Odyssey Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.2GHz dual-core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Lagoda Odyssey is a turn-based RPG. Explore forests, caves, dungeons, and cities in this adventure. Make friends, complete quests, fight enemies, and catch some fish.
